object.script:
/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Server Version : SQL Server 2016 ($(ServerVersion)) Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft SQL Server Enterprise Edition Source Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2016 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SmoBaselineVerification_RcExternalFileFormat] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = RCFILE, SERDE_METHOD = N'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.columnar.ColumnarSerDe', DATA_COMPRESSION = N'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.DefaultCodec')
